DataElement.preferredDefinition: An indication whether or not the patient consented to be contacted in the future for participating in a research study.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Disposition Domain Patient Personal Contact Future Clinical Trial Participation Consent
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A subject domain utilized for the submission of information encompassing and representing data, vocabulary or records related to disposition._A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._Direct or indirect interaction between individuals or organizations._A time that is yet to come._A research study that prospectively assigns human participants or groups of humans to one or more health-related interventions to evaluate the effects on health outcomes._The act of taking part in an activity._Permission to do something.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A subject domain utilized for the submission of information encompassing and representing data, vocabulary or records related to disposition.

Concepts.definition: A subject domain utilized for the submission of information encompassing and representing data, vocabulary or records related to disposition.

Property.preferredName: Patient Personal Contact Future Clinical Trial Participation Consent
Property.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.:Direct or indirect interaction between individuals or organizations.:A time that is yet to come.:A research study that prospectively assigns human participants or groups of humans to one or more health-related interventions to evaluate the effects on health outcomes.:The act of taking part in an activity.:Permission to do something.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.
Direct or indirect interaction between individuals or organizations.
A time that is yet to come.
A research study that prospectively assigns human participants or groups of humans to one or more health-related interventions to evaluate the effects on health outcomes.
The act of taking part in an activity.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the management of a research protocol and its case report forms.

ValueDomain.preferredName: CDISC SDTM Yes No Unknown or Not Applicable Response Terminology Indicator
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Terminology codelist used with Yes No Unknown or Not Applicable Response within the Clinical Data Interchange Standards Consortium Study Data Tabulation Model._An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown/not applicable.:An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

Concepts.longName: CDISC SDTM Yes No Unknown or Not Applicable Response Terminology
Concepts.definition: Terminology codelist used with Yes No Unknown or Not Applicable Response within the Clinical Data Interchange Standards Consortium Study Data Tabulation Model.

An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Elevated to Standard per governance approval by RA. 2021-6-9 ak  12/18/18 TT released/MC. 8-21-18 edit to PVs/CDISC revised submission values; tt.  Created as part of CDISC mapping task. 6.27.18 mc

ReferenceDocuments.name: Patient has given permission
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient has given permission to be contacted in the future to take part in more research:

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: I agree that my study doctor, or someone on the study team, may contact me or my doctor to see if I wish to learn about results from this study.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: I agree that my study doctor, or someone on the study team, may contact me or my doctor to see if I wish to learn about results from these studies.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 3
ReferenceDocuments.description: I agree that my study doctor, or someone on the study team, may contact me or my doctor to see if I wish to participate in other research in the future.

DataElement.changeDescription: 6-3-20 released/MM. Created for Seed Study; tmt
